text: aru tai laga sob chithi te likha nisena, etu kotha khan taikhan logote koi ase. Kunba kotha khan bujhi bole digdar ase, juntu gyaan nathaka aru biya manu khan pora etu laga motlob ke ulta kori diye, etu nisena taikhan Isor laga pobitro kotha bhi eneka kore, hoilebi taikhan nijor he dukh pabo.
